contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 5, 2002 D West Wales BBA Contest (Second Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-second-section
None
Ammanford, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - solo cornet - Markham. Prizes - 1st £120, 2nd £80, 3rd £60. 7 bands competed.
Aug. 12, 2015, 1:24 a.m. July 3, 2020, 9:37 p.m.
1 Markham and District Band A. Jones
2 Blaenavon Town Band Bryn Davies
3 RAF St. Athan Voluntary Band Alan Bourne
4 Lewis Merthyr Band Laurence Harries
5 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Band Ron Williams
6 Oakdale Silver Band Ron Probyn
7 Ogmore Valley Silver Band Ivor Barnett
